name: Cosmic Crashers
storyline: After surviving an outer space anomaly, the crew of a remote human space station find themselves teleported to what seems to be their home galaxy forward in the future. A future in which humanity has gone extinct. The crew comes to learn that the galaxy is now the battleground of several species of alien life, each attempting to wipe out the other. Caught in the middle of it all, the last of humanity fuels up their experimental Mark II crusader starfighter, and searches out a way to harness the alien tech in hopes of returning to their time. It's time to crash this party.
summary: Fast paced, action packed ropguelite in space. Pilot your space ship to defeat waves of enemies, but be careful - they are coming for your station.
